GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_BORED_LEAVING
~z~Hey, Niko. Let's go shall we?
~z~Does your other whore like the new pants?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~是你的其他婊子喜欢这条新裤子吗？

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Those glasses are cool, Niko.
GCKK_ACT_PKI_FEET_GOOD
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_STANDARD
~z~Oh, Niko. Do you mind if we do something else instead?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~噢，Niko，不介意的话，我们能不能做点别的。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Only if you don't know how to drive them.
GCKK_ACT_CLOTHES_BAD
~z~Those shoes are good.
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_CLUB_GENERIC
~z~This isn't exactly an exciting car, is it?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~这车实在难以让人提起兴致。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_FEET_BAD
~z~If you want new shoes, Niko. I can buy them. Don't spend your own money.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~如果你想换新鞋，Niko，我帮你买，别花你自己的钱。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_BORED_TAKEHOME
~z~I get discounts.
~z~Niko, please don't spend too much money on me.
~z~Sorry, Niko. I didn't realize it was going to take this long. I don't think I've got time for this. Can you take me home?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~对不起，Niko，没想到这次约会会这么久，我想我不能多陪了。你能送我回家吗？

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Niko. My schedule is pretty tight at the moment. I can't really wait around for you. Let's go.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~Niko，我的安排真的很紧，真的等不了太久的，赶紧走吧。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~You didn't just get this car to impress me, did you? Niko!
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你买这辆车不只是想给我留下印象吧？Niko！

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_CAR_NEW_BAD
GCKK_ACT_CLOTHES_UNUSUAL
~z~Alright, let's go bowling.
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_K_WILL
~z~You don't need to take me to a place like this, Niko. Your company is more precious to me than an expensive meal.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~没必要带我来这种地方的，Niko。你的陪伴比山珍海味更加珍贵。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~I'd appreciate it if we did something else instead of this. Sorry, Niko.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~我更希望我们能做点别的事。抱歉，Niko。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_RGERV
~z~This old thing, Niko? I think it's about time you traded in.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~还是这破车，Niko？我想你也该换车了。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_FASTFOOD
~z~The new shoes make you look like a pimp.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~这双鞋让你像一个拉皮条的。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Do you come to this club to pick up your cheap whores? Fine then, pretend I'm a whore.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你来这儿找你的贱人婊子了？那好吧，你当我就是吧。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_ARRIVem_NOTLATE
~z~Okay, if you're going to be like this, Niko. I'll make my own way home. Call me.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~好吧，你一定要坚持的话，Niko，我就自己回去了。有空找我。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~I don't really like being driven around in this car, Niko.
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_PUB_GENERIC
~z~Hey, are you LawChick? We met online, I'm Niko Bellic.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~嘿，你是律师小妹吗？我们网上认识的，我是Niko Bellic。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Thank God you lost those glasses, Niko.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~谢天谢地你把那副眼镜摘了，Niko。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Oh, this guy's okay. Let's go see the show.
~z~Oh, I haven't seen that top before, have I?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~噢，这件上衣我之前没见过吧？

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~This car gets me in the mood, Niko.
~z~The ball's in your court, Niko. I'm happy to do whatever you enjoy. It's such a treat for me to be out and about.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~决定权在你，Niko。只要你喜欢我就高兴了。对我来说，出去走走就很快乐。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~What's different about you? Oh... yeah, you're not wearing the glasses. Pity.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你人好像不太一样？哦...对，你没戴着那副眼镜，真可惜。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~We're playing darts again, are we? Okay.
~z~Niko, you look so sweet in those clothes.
~z~Thanks, Kiki.
~z~Please tell me you didn't waste your hard earned money on a new top on my account.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~希望你不是为了我才会花血汗钱买这件新上衣的。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_CAR_NONE_AA
GCKK_ACT_CAR_OKAY
~z~Hey, your clothes are pretty out there, aren't they?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~嘿，你这身衣服还挺好看，不是吗？

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_HINT
~z~New pants, I see.
GCKK_ACT_PKI_HAT_GOOD
~z~I like the car, Niko.
~z~Don't spend your money on a cab, Niko. Let's walk somewhere.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~别浪费钱打车了，Niko，我们走着去吧。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~They'll do, you know.
~z~Aren't you a handsome man, Niko.
~z~I can't do this right now, Niko. My head's not in the right place. I'm sorry.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~我来不了，Niko。我头有点昏，不好意思。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Hey. I thought you stood me up, Niko. Where's your car?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~嘿，我还以为你放我鸽子呢，Niko。你车呢？

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Okay, why don't we play pool? My ex, Tyrone was falsely accused of beating this guy to death with a pool cue.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~好吧，为什么不打台球呢？我前任，Tyrone曾经被诬告用台球杆打死了人。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~I hope that top wasn't expensive, Niko.
~z~Niko, pool is really becoming our special game.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~Niko，台球都快变成我们的专属游戏了。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Oh God, I can't think. I'm just happy to be out of the office. It's such hard work at City Hall.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~天哪，我想不出。能出办公室我就很开心了，在市政厅工作真是太辛苦了。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Those clothes fit you like an old glove.
~z~I liked the old hat, Niko. It reminded me of the good times we've had together.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~我挺喜欢老的那顶帽子的，Niko。能让我想起我们共度的欢乐时光。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~A motorbike. Aren't these dangerous?
GCKK_ACT_PKI_HAT_BAD
~z~Bowling, Niko? Okay then.
~z~Those pants are good.
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_DARTS_NOT
~z~Why do you drive this thing, Niko?
~z~Hey Niko, it's Kiki. Kiki Jenkins.
~z~This is the sort of car you should be driving.
~z~I used to like that old car you drove, Niko.
~z~Niko. Better late than never, are you parked nearby?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~Niko，迟到总比不到好，你的车停在附近了吗？

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Niko, I've been looking forward to this so much. Let's go.
~z~Those clothes really suit you, I've told you that before, haven't I?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~这身衣服真的很适合你，我以前也讲过对吧？

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_HINT
~z~Ricky Gervais it is then.
~z~Sorry, Niko. I'm not in the mood for this right now.
~z~Okay then, Niko. Let's go on your bike.
~z~I'm not sure really. I don't get that much time off work so I'm just happy to be out.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~我不太确定。我没有那么多的休息时间，只要能出来转转我就很开心了。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Hey, Niko. Is your car round here somewhere?
GCKK_ACT_PKI_CLOTHES_UNUSAL
GCKK_ACT_DIFF_ACTIVITY_NO
~z~Can't you get a new car, Niko?
~z~All sorts of stuff, Niko. Whatever you want to do. I'm sure I'll enjoy it.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~什么都喜欢，Niko。只要是你喜欢的，我就可以喜欢。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~I thought we'd walk for a bit.
~z~Sorry, Niko. I really do need to get back home. Give me a call, okay?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~对不起，Niko，我真的要回家了。有时间再找我吧，好吗？

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_CAR_GOOD
~z~Haven't you got a car?
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_BOWL_BEFORE
~z~Hey, sweetie. Where'd you park your car?
~z~You want to go bowling again? Alright!
GCKK_ACT_PKI_SAME_GOOD
~z~I can't just play darts with you the whole time. Are you ashamed to take me anywhere else?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~我也不能老是和你玩飞镖吧，带我去其他地方不行吗？

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Your clothes really smell of you. It's so sexy.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你这身衣服太有感觉了，超性感。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~You're still wearing those flashy clothes, I see.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~还穿这些华而不实的衣服啊，行吧。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_ARRIVEF_LATE
~z~How are we going to get anywhere?
~z~Oh, bowling is it? This is becoming our regular thing. We could have our wedding at a bowling alley.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~哦，又是保龄球？这都快成我们的标配了。干脆直接在保龄球馆办婚礼算了。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_CAR_SAME_GOOD
GCKK_ACT_PKI_CLOTHES_BAD
~z~Aren't we all?
~z~Haven't you got a car?
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_LATE
~z~Pool, Niko? I'll play pool with you if that's what makes you happy.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~台球吗，Niko？你喜欢打台球的话我就陪你。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Your clothes are cool.
~z~I'm always having financial problems.
~z~That's my favorite outfit of yours.
~z~A club, eh? We won't exactly be able to talk in here though, will we?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~俱乐部，呃？这里不是能说话的地方吧？

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Darts again, is it? Do you practice throwing darts with your other whores?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~又是飞镖？你是不是整天跟其他婊子练飞镖？

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~I just don't think those clothes are you, Niko.
~z~Have you got a car parked somewhere, Niko?
~z~I'm not sure this car is really you, Niko.
~z~What a shame, we didn't get here in time for the show.
~z~Oh, I like the new pants.
~z~The glasses make you look shifty, Niko. You aren't hiding anything from me, are you?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~这副眼镜显得你靠不住，Niko。你没瞒我什么吧？

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~I like the fact that you don't need to wear expensive clothes to be cool, Niko.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你不穿昂贵的衣服也可以很帅，我喜欢这一点，Niko。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Tremaine used to take me to places like this, they're so quick and easy.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~Tremaine以前常带我来这样的地方，又快又方便。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~I'm not sure about the new hat, Niko.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你这新帽子感觉有点微妙啊，Niko。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_NOGLASS_GOOD
~z~I can't see cars like this on the street without thinking of you, Niko.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~Niko，在路上看到这种车我就会想起你。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_CLOTHES_GOOD
~z~What're you into, Kiki?
~z~The Russian Cabaret. This should be interesting, Niko.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~俄罗斯歌舞表演，这应该很有趣，Niko。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Well, at least you came. Let's find something to do.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~好吧，至少你来了。一起出去玩吧。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~These places are great. There's no point in spending a lot of money on food.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~这地方很赞，在吃上面花太多钱是没有意义的。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~My Niko. You're here. Let's find something to do.
~z~Oh no, we missed the show. That's such bad luck, Niko.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~哦不，我们错过了表演。真是倒霉，Niko。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Isn't it cool that we're comfortable enough with one another to not have to dress up?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~我们不用刻意去打扮也可以相处得很舒服，真是太好啦。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_CAR_NEW_GOOD
GCKK_ACT_PKI_NOHAT_GOOD
~z~You really don't need to dress up to impress me, Niko.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你真的不用为了我刻意打扮的，Niko。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~We're walking are we, Niko? I love walking with you.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~我们在散步吗，Niko？我喜欢跟你散步。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~It gets around.
GCKK_ACT_CAR_SAME_BAD
~z~It's hard for me to concentrate on eating when I'm with you, Niko.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~和你在一起的时候，我的注意力都不在吃的上面，Niko。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~I bet you can run fast in those new shoes.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你穿这双新鞋肯定能跑得飞快。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_CAR_BAD
~z~I miss your old hat, Niko.
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_BOWL_NOT
~z~Niko. Let's go enjoy ourselves.
~z~Pool, again? You'd think I'd get better at it.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~又是台球？你认为我的技术变好了是吧。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Niko, your car. You really must be struggling.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~Niko，你这车啊。你的生活一定很困难吧。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Bowling again, are you hoping to bump into one of your other whores here?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~又是保龄球，你想在这儿找你的其他婊子吗？

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~It's so nice to just walk and not worry about cars and stuff.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~走路就挺好，不用想去开什么车。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_BOWL_LAST
~z~I like the new hat.
~z~Please don't dress up on my account, Niko.
~z~Oh, I miss your old car, Niko.
~z~Umm, Niko. Why're you late? You haven't been seeing anyone else have you? Let's go.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~嗯，Niko，你怎么迟到了？你该不会还有别的女人吧？走吧。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_SAME_BAD
~z~This car just oozes sex, Niko. Maybe that's because you own it.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~这车散发着性感的气息，Niko。也许是因为这是你的车。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~I hope you're not trying to impress one of your other whores with this new car. It doesn't impress me.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~希望你的新车不是为了你的哪个婊子买的。反正我不喜欢。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_INTRO
~z~Don't hide your eyes behind those glasses, Niko. They're beautiful.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你的眼睛很好看，Niko，别戴这种眼镜了。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~That hat's good.
~z~Your eyes are beautiful. I'm so pleased you're not wearing those glasses.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你的眼睛很好看，幸好你没有戴着那副烂眼镜。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_LATE
GCKK_ACT_PKI_NOHAT_BAD
GCKK_ACT_PKI_CAR_BIKE
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_POOL_BEFORE
~z~What happened to your old car, Niko?
~z~This place is so cute. I'm only going to have a couple of drinks though.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~这地方真不错，不过我只能稍微喝几杯。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Maybe your new hat will grow on me, we'll see.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~看多了说不定就习惯了，你的新帽子。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Okay, Niko. Let's play darts.
~z~Hey. I don't want to sound like a whining girlfriend or anything but please don't make me wait for you. Let's go on our date.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~嘿。我不想像老妈子一样啰嗦，但是求你下次别迟到了。赶快出发吧。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_CLOTHES_GOOD
~z~I'd really like to experience your culture with you, Niko. Let's go.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~我很乐意体验你们那边的文化，Niko，我们走吧。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_INTRO
GCKK_ACT_CAR_GOOD
~z~You look so cute when you're playing pool, Niko.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你打台球的样子真的很靓仔，Niko。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Niko, you sweetie. You know I like to be driven in cars like this.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~Niko，小可爱，你知道我喜欢乘这种车。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_TORSO_BAD
GCKK_ACT_PKI_LEGS_BAD
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVEC_NOTLATE
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_CABARET
~z~This is nice, Niko. But anywhere'd be nice with you.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~这地方不错，但能和你一起的地方就是好地方。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Okay, Niko. I'm really into bowling. That's only if you are though...
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~好吧，Niko。我很乐意打保龄球，只要你高兴的话...

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Hey, I like what you're wearing.
~z~Oh, drinking? I really shouldn't...
~z~It's a shame you don't have that old car anymore.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你以前那辆车没了，真是可惜。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_CLOTHES_OKAY
GCKK_ACT_PKI_GLASSHAT_GOOD
~z~Sure, let's play darts. If you enjoy it, that is.
~z~Oh, cool car.
~z~Same old trusty vehicle. Nice.
~z~Where's your car, Niko?
~z~That top's nice.
~z~This car's nice.
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_DARTS_BEFORE
GCKK_ACT_PKI_GLASSHAT_BAD
~z~This old car. I really like it.
~z~Oh, you're not wearing the glasses. That's a shame.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~哦，你没戴那副眼镜，真是可惜。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_CLOTHES_OKAY
~z~Oh, darts again. Not what I'd normally do but if you're into it...
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~噢，又是飞镖。我其实不怎么喜欢，不过既然你喜欢...

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~All my ex-boyfriends love this guy, Niko. Come on.
~z~Ok, Niko, I'm a busy woman, I haven't got time to be screwing around like this. Can you take me home?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~好吧，Niko，我是个很忙的女人，没时间陪你乱转。送我回家好吗？

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~I guess so.
GCKK_ACT_PKI_LEGS_GOOD
~z~What a good idea, Niko. I sometimes get emotional when I drink so stop me from having too much.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~真是个好地方，Niko。喝多了的话我可能会有些情绪化，所以别让我喝太多。

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_CAR_OKAY
~z~Katt Williams really tells it like it is. I'm so pleased you brought me here, Niko.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~Katt Williams说得挺好的。很高兴你能带我来这儿，Niko。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~We've got some memories of this car, don't we?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~这辆车承载了我们之间的回忆，不是吗？

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_NOGLASS_BAD
GCKK_ACT_CAR_BIKE
~z~Hey, let's go have some fun.
GCKK_ACT_PKI_CAR_NONE_
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_POOL_LAST
~z~We're playing pool again, Niko? If that makes you happy.
~z~Thanks for getting rid of that hat, Niko. You really do care about what I think.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~谢谢你为了我放弃那顶帽子，Niko，你真的在乎我的感受。

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~You love this old car, don't you Niko?
~z~Okay, this is nice. Stop me from drinking too much, okay?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~好，这家好。别让我喝太多，好吗？

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_PUB_FAVOURITE
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVEF_NOTLATE
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_POOL_NOT
~z~Sorry Niko, but I don't like your car. Does that make me a bad person?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~对不起，Niko，但是我真的不喜欢你的车。说这话会让我像个坏人吗？

GCKK2AU.original: ~z~Niko, why're you wearing that stuff? Are you having financial problems?
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~Niko，你咋穿了身这个？你经济上有困难吗？

GCKK2AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_TORSO_GOOD
~z~This is an expensive car, Niko.
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_DARTS_LAST
GCKK_ACT_ARRIVE_HIGHEND
~z~Those are nice glasses, Niko.
GCKK_ACT_PKI_CAR_BAD
GCKK_ACT_CAR_NONE
~z~It's so sweet of you to get rid of that hat. You knew I didn't like it.
GCKK2AU.translated: ~z~你能拿掉那顶帽子我真的高兴，你知道我不喜欢它。
